title: S15 Ep18: The Journey
itunes:title: The Journey
description:
Darkness Radio gets enlightened today as we take The Journey, Dave's story of spirits, serpents, soul searching and facing Death! Join us for the most personal episode in our history with special guest, G.K, Darkness Dave and Tim Dennis.

This past month has been HUGE for your ol' pal, Darkness Dave. New revelations of found family and a life changing event that has been 52 years in the making. Join Tim as he navigates this unusual set of circumstances that had Dave confront his fear of Death, Snakes, Spirits and Time with their special guest G.K.

Please consider donating to the Special Olympics and help us in our yearly drive to raise much needed funds for these awesome competitors, let's blow past our goal!

Donate Here: https://bit.ly/2uEHZRi

Engage your brain with fun puzzles and collect tons of cute characters! 5-star rated mobile puzzle game, Download FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play !
